channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Multisite User Sync/Unsync
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Multisite User Sync/Unsync

item.title: CVE-2021-25038|2024-08-03T19:49:14.542Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20multisite%20user%20sync%2Funsync
item.description: The WordPress Multisite User Sync/Unsync WordPress plugin before 2.1.2 does not sanitise and escape the wmus_source_blog and wmus_record_per_page parameters before outputting them back in attributes, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issues
